item.description:
Say bye to April showers and hello to May flowers! I am glad to see that we have had lots of people participating in our meet ups and everyone seems to be having a blast! The next meet up will be held on May 22nd from 1:00 - 3:00pm. Whether permitting, we can either have the meet up inside or outside. Hope to see everyone there!

PS - If you would like your dog groomed after them meet up let me know prior to the 17th and we can schedule an appointment with a 25% off discount. If you have any questions give me a call or send me an email.
item.how_to_find_us: Ask anyone at the front desk!

group.name: The Greater Boston Active Small Dog Meetup Group
